pos_mean_info_list.mean: 公民的；民间的；文职的；有礼貌的；根据民法的
教化；使…文明；启发（civilize的过去分词）

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指广义的文化，标志人类发展开化的进程。强调物质方面的文明。
侧重指精神方面，即多由科技、文化等所体现的人类智力开发的程度。

bilingual.source: Can you think of anything that we use today, which was invented by an ancient civilization?
bilingual.target: 你能想到我们今天使用的任何由古代文明发明的东西吗？
教育是文明社会的基石。
文明社会需要每个人的努力。

bilingual.source: We should strive to build a civilization.
bilingual.target: 我们应该为建设文明社会而努力。

bilingual.source: The ancient civilization vanished without a trace.
bilingual.target: 古代文明消失得无影无踪。

bilingual.source: In all ages, human civilization has progressed.
bilingual.target: 从古至今，人类文明不断进步。

bilingual.source: Ancient Greece is the cradle of Western civilization.
bilingual.target: 古希腊是西方文明的摇篮。

bilingual.source: The ancient civilization thrived on this terra.
bilingual.target: 古代文明在这片土地上繁荣发展。

bilingual.source: We should protect and pass on our civilization.
bilingual.target: 我们应该保护和传承我们的文明。

list.abstract: civilization（英 [ˌsɪvəlaɪˈzeɪʃn]，美 [ˌsɪvələˈzeɪʃn]），英语单词，作名词为文明；文化；文明进程。例句：Digital life could replace human civilization.（数字生活可以取代人类文明。） civilization的近义词有culture，kultur。

yingyinNormal.en: And what a civilization is the Greeks'!
yingyinNormal.zh: 还有，希腊文明多么令人赞叹啊！

yingyinNormal.en: And our side, the side of education and accomplishment is the future of civilization!
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们这边，是受教育是文明的未来！

yingyinNormal.en: Really? Why? They exist in case we ever make contact with an alien civilization.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真的吗？为啥要这部门？以防哪天真有机会跟外星文明接触。

yingyinNormal.en: If you think about it, civilization has always depended on a measure of elective ignorance.
yingyinNormal.zh: 仔细想想，文明向来依靠某种程度上的选择性无知。

yingyinNormal.en: Fossil energy, the oil we need for our civilization, is causing the ocean to overheat.
yingyinNormal.zh: 化石能源，用来发展文明的石油，使海洋温度升得过高。

yingyinNormal.en: No. Because you respect the rules. Because you know without them, civilization becomes chaos.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，因为你尊重规则，因为你知道没有规则文明就会变成一团混乱。

yingyinNormal.en: They're some kind of prototype Autobot technology. They say Sentinel was the Einstein of his civilization.
yingyinNormal.zh: 某种程度上说他们是汽车人的原型科技，他们说御天敌是他们文明里的爱因斯坦。

yingyinNormal.en: And we end up with spoiled, overpaid bonehead athletes who contribute little to civilization other than slam dunks and touchdowns.
yingyinNormal.zh: 于是产生了被宠坏，薪水过高的呆头运动员。他们对文明毫无贡献，只会扣篮和达阵。

yingyinNormal.en: Don't thank me. If you wanna thank something, thank the volcano that erupted thousands of years ago, killing but perfectly preserving an entire civilization.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别谢我，要谢就谢那座火山几千年前爆发，毁灭却也保存了一整个文明遗迹。

yingyinNormal.en: I mean, far be it from us to tell an ancient civilization its business, but Syria is now basically unrivaled as the most violent place on the planet. I know, I know.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们就不该告诉一个古老的文明怎么处理它的问题，但现在叙利亚是这世界上最暴力的地方。我知道。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, I'd pick swan because, the resulting hybrid would have the advanced industrial civilization of a human and the long graceful neck I've always dreamed of having. Wrong. Leonard?
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，我会选天鹅，因为半人半天鹅既能享受人类先进的工业文明，又能拥有我一直梦寐以求的优雅长颈。

yingyinNormal.en: Their quest for a boss put the minions front and center for some of the civilization most historic moments.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们对老大的追求，让小黄人经历了很多历史上著名的时刻。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (un)文明; (特定时期和地区的)社会文明

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a state of human society that is very developed and organized
sense_info_list.zh: (un)文明; (特定时期和地区的)社会文明

examination_example.sentence: If you get lost without a phone or a compass, we have a few tricks to help you navigate back to <highlight>civilization</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你在没有手机或指南针的情况下迷路了，我们有一些技巧可以帮助你导航回到文明世界。

examination_example.sentence: Yet science has a cultural history, too, with roots going back to the dawn of <highlight>civilization</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，科学也有一段文化史，其根源可以追溯到文明的开端。

examination_example.sentence: Both men emphasized the fragments of <highlight>civilization</highlight> that the soldiers shared with each other and the civilians.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 两人都强调了士兵和平民之间共享的文明碎片。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 去动词化的抽象名词后缀, 表示"行为, 过程, 结果"

word_usage.usage: civilization一般作不可数名词，但在表示“不同种类的社会文明”时，可作可数名词，如：the civilizations of ancient Greece and Rome

exam_freq_info.chinese: (un)文明; (特定时期和地区的)社会文明

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a state of human society that is very developed and organized
sense_info_list.zh: (un)文明; (特定时期和地区的)社会文明

examination_example.sentence_trans: 数字生活可以取代人类文明。

examination_example.sentence: There's a risk that human <highlight>civilization</highlight> could be replaced by a superior type of digital life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人类文明有可能被更高级的数字生活所取代。

examination_example.sentence: Stephen Hawking has praised the creation of an academic institute as "crucial to the future of our <highlight>civilisation</highlight> and our species".
examination_example.sentence_trans: Stephen Hawking 称赞一个学术机构为“对我们文明和物种的未来至关重要”。

examination_example.sentence: It is hardly associated with great <highlight>civilizations</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它很难与伟大的文明联系在一起。

examination_example.sentence: Now a third and far more significant motivation presents itself: meeting these goals may be necessary to prevent the collapse of our <highlight>civilization</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在出现了第三个更重要的动机：实现这些目标可能是避免我们文明崩溃的必要条件。

examination_example.sentence: The author has come to agree that food shortages could ultimately lead to the collapse of world <highlight>civilization</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作者认同食物短缺最终会导致世界文明的崩溃。

examination_example.sentence: The cost for saving our <highlight>civilization</highlight> would be considerably less than the world's current military spending.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 拯救我们文明的成本将大大低于世界目前的军队费用开支。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 去动词化的抽象名词后缀, 表示"行为, 过程, 结果"

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The lost Inca <highlight>civilization</highlight>, is thought to be a mystery.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 失落的印加文明被认为是一个谜。

examination_example.sentence: They make China own an important and even top position in the history of human <highlight>civilization</highlight> (文明).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们让中国在人类文明史上拥有重要的甚至是最高的地位。

examination_example.sentence: Four great inventions and their position in the history of human <highlight>civilization</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 四大发明及其在人类文明史上的地位。
